locations.name: Campus Entrance
locations.brief_description: You are at the campus entrance (your starting point).
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 1

You are at the main campus entrance. You just woke up and realized you're missing important items! You need to find your USB drive, laptop charger, and lucky mug, then DEPOSIT them at Oak House (Location 15) before 1pm.

IMPORTANT: You can only carry 2 items at a time!

You can DROP items to leave them here, or DEPOSIT items at Oak House to earn points.

You can go east or south.

locations.name: Main Path
locations.brief_description: You are on the main campus path.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 2

You are walking along the main campus path. Students are rushing to their classes. There's a construction wall to the east blocking the path. You can go west back to the entrance or south.

locations.name: Campus Cafe
locations.brief_description: You are at the campus cafe.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 4

You are at the busy campus cafe. The smell of coffee fills the air. You see your T-card on a table and your lucky mug near the counter!

Remember: You can only carry 2 items at a time.
- DROP: Leave items here temporarily (can pick up later)
- DEPOSIT: Only works at Oak House for earning points

You can go south or west.

locations.name: West Plaza
locations.brief_description: You are at the west plaza.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 5

You are at a small plaza on the west side of campus. Benches are arranged in a circle around a small garden. There's a wall to the east blocking the path. You can go north back to the entrance or south.

locations.name: East Corridor
locations.brief_description: You are in the east corridor.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 8

You are in a narrow corridor connecting the cafe to the southern areas. The walls are lined with notice boards. You can go north back to the cafe, south, or west.

locations.name: South Plaza
locations.brief_description: You are at the south plaza.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 9

You are at the south plaza. A large fountain sits in the center, water gently splashing. Students are studying on nearby benches. You can go north, east, or south.

locations.name: Garden Path
locations.brief_description: You are on a garden path.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 10

You are walking along a peaceful garden path. Colorful flowers bloom on both sides, and trees provide shade. You can go west, east, or south.

locations.name: Bahen Center for Information Technology
locations.brief_description: You are at the Bahen Center.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 11 - BAHEN CENTER

You are at the Bahen Center for Information Technology. You were working here yesterday! Your USB drive is on a desk in the corner, and your laptop charger is plugged into the wall!

Remember: You can only carry 2 items at a time. You can DROP items here if needed.

You can go west, south, or east.

locations.name: Science Building
locations.brief_description: You are at the science building.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 12

You are at the main science building. Through the windows, you can see lab equipment and students conducting experiments. You can go west, north, or south.

locations.name: Robarts Library
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 13 - ROBARTS LIBRARY üîí

You are at the entrance of Robarts Library. The massive brutalist building looms above.

üîë ENTRANCE REQUIREMENT: You must have T-card in your inventory to enter.
Once you have the T-card, it never expires, but you must carry it each time you want to enter.

Inside, you can see a dorm key on a study desk!

You can go north or east.

locations.name: Central Plaza
locations.brief_description: You are at the central plaza.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 14

You are at a central plaza where many paths intersect. This is a busy crossroads on campus. Students are sitting on benches, chatting and eating lunch. You can go north, west, or east.

locations.name: Oak House Residence
locations.brief_description: You are at Oak House residence - THE WIN LOCATION!
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 15 - OAK HOUSE üèÜ

You are at Oak House residence. This is your TARGET location!

üîë ENTRANCE REQUIREMENT: You must have Dorm Key in your inventory to enter.
Once you have the Dorm Key, it never expires, but you must carry it each time you want to enter.

üéØ TO WIN: Use DEPOSIT command to deliver all THREE required items here:
  1. USB Drive
  2. Laptop Charger
  3. Lucky Mug

üìù Commands:
  - DROP: Leave items here temporarily (no points)
  - DEPOSIT: Permanently deliver items (earn points + count toward win)

You can go west, east, or north.

locations.name: Sports Complex
locations.brief_description: You are at the sports complex.
locations.long_description:
LOCATION 16

You are at the athletic sports complex. You can hear the sounds of basketballs bouncing and people cheering inside. This is the far corner of campus. You can go west or north.

items.name: USB Drive
items.description: A silver USB drive with all your project files. You desperately need this!

items.name: Laptop Charger
items.description: Your laptop charger. Your battery is almost dead!

items.name: Lucky Mug
items.description: Your lucky U of T mug. You can't submit without it!

items.name: T-card
items.description: Your student ID card. Needed to enter Robarts Library. Never expires once you have it!

items.name: Dorm Key
items.description: A key to Oak House residence. Required to enter! Never expires once you have it!
